jcr:content.jcr:title: List of monitors of the Royal Navy

contentheadline.headline: List of monitors of the Royal Navy

contentrichtext.text: {{Royal_Navy_ship_types}} This is a '''list of [[monitor (ship)|monitor]]s of the [[Royal Navy]]''' of the [[United Kingdom]]. *[[Humber class monitor|''Humber'' class]] **[[HMS Severn (1914)|''Severn'']] **[[HMS Humber (1914)|''Humber'']] **[[HMS Mersey (1914)|''Mersey'']] *[[Abercrombie class monitor|''Abercrombie'' class]] **[[HMS Abercrombie (1914)|''Abercrombie'']] **[[HMS Havelock (1915)|''Havelock'']] **[[HMS Raglan|''Raglan'']] **[[HMS Roberts (1915)|''Roberts'']] *[[Lord Clive class monitor|''Lord Clive'' class]] **[[HMS Lord Clive|''Lord Clive'']] **[[HMS General Crauford|''General Craufurd'']] **[[HMS Earl of Peterborough|''Earl of Peterborough'']] **[[HMS Sir Thomas Picton|''Sir Thomas Picton'']] **[[HMS Prince Eugene|''Prince Eugene'']] **[[HMS Prince Rupert|''Prince Rupert'']] **[[HMS Sir John Moore|''Sir John Moore'']] **[[HMS General Wolfe|''General Wolfe'']] *[[Marshal Ney class monitor|''Marshal Ney'' class]] **[[HMS Marshal Ney|''Marshal Ney'']] **[[HMS Marshal Soult|''Marshal Soult'']] *[[Gorgon class monitor|''Gorgon'' class]] **[[HMS Gorgon (1914)|''Gorgon'']] **[[HMS Glatton (1914)|''Glatton'']] *[[M15 class monitor|''M15'' class]] **[[HMS M15|''M15'']] **[[HMS M16|''M16'']] **[[HMS M17|''M17'']] **[[HMS M18|''M18'']] **[[HMS M19|''M19'']] **[[HMS M20|''M20'']] **[[HMS M21|''M21'']] **[[HMS M22|''M22'']] **[[HMS M23|''M23'']] **[[HMS M24|''M24'']] **[[HMS M25|''M25'']] **[[HMS M26|''M26'']] **[[HMS M27|''M27'']] **[[HMS M28|''M28'']] *[[M29 class monitor|''M29'' class]] **[[HMS M29|''M29'']] (later HMS ''Medusa'') **[[HMS M30|''M30'']] **[[HMS M31|''M31'']] **[[HMS M32|''M32'']] **[[HMS M33|''M33'']] *[[Erebus class monitor|''Erebus'' class]] **[[HMS Erebus (I02)|''Erebus'']] **[[HMS Terror (I03)|''Terror'']] *[[Roberts class monitor|''Roberts'' class]] **[[HMS Roberts (F40)|''Roberts'']] **[[HMS Abercrombie (F109)|''Abercrombie'']] == External links == {{Commons|Category:Monitors of the
